title: ChatGPT
description: A conversational AI tool capable of assisting users in generating text, answering questions, providing explanations, offering creative suggestions, engaging in interactive conversations, and even writing code.

title: Bard
description: Gemini is a large language model that can generate text, translate languages, write different kinds of creative content, answer your questions in an informative way, summarize text, work with images and code, and be personalized and collaborative. It can be used for a variety of purposes, such as understanding the main points of a text, getting a quick overview of a topic, generating ideas, brainstorming, answering questions, working with images and code.

title: Microsoft Copilot
description: Bing Chat is a powerful AI-powered chatbot that can help you with a variety of tasks. It can answer your questions, translate languages, write different kinds of creative content, and complete tasks. It is also able to understand and communicate fluently in multiple languages. Recently, Bing Chat has added new features such as multimodal visual search, persistent chat.

title: Adobe Podcast
description: Adobe Podcast is a web-based audio recording and editing tool that utilizes artificial intelligence (AI) to enhance the quality of audio recordings. It offers a range of features that make it a powerful tool for podcasters. Additionally, it allows for remote recording and provides automatic transcription capabilities.

title: Looka
description: Looka is an AI-powered logo design platform that allows users to create professional logos with ease. It provides a simple and intuitive interface, along with a vast library of design elements, fonts, and color palettes to choose from. Looka's intelligent algorithms generate customized logo options based on user preferences, making it a valuable tool for businesses and individuals looking for high-quality branding.

title: Github Copilot
description: Copilot is an AI-powered code completion tool developed by GitHub in collaboration with OpenAI. It uses machine learning models to assist developers by suggesting code snippets and completing lines of code as they write. With Copilot, developers can increase their productivity, save time, and gain insights from its extensive knowledge base, which includes code from popular open-source projects.

title: Dall-E
description: DALL·E is an advanced image generation model developed by OpenAI. It uses a combination of deep learning and generative adversarial networks (GANs) to create unique and highly realistic images from textual descriptions. DALL·E can understand and interpret written prompts to generate corresponding images, often with surprising and imaginative results. This groundbreaking AI technology opens up new possibilities for creative expression, visual storytelling, and artistic exploration.

title: Firefly
description: Adobe Firefly is a family of creative generative AI models that can be used to generate images, text effects, and other creative content. it is designed to help users ideate, create, and communicate more effectively, and it can be used to enhance creative workflows in a variety of ways.

title: Tome PPT
description: Tome is an AI-powered storytelling platform that enables anyone to create and share immersive narratives. It combines a fluid, interactive canvas with an AI storytelling partner so you can create amazing ppt, compelling stories using video, images, and text. Tome uses intelligent titles and layouts to automatically generate content, which can be further customized by the user.

title: Stable Diffusion
description: Stable Diffusion is a latent text-to-image diffusion model capable of generating photo-realistic images given any text input, cultivates autonomous freedom to produce incredible imagery, empowers billions of people to create stunning art within seconds.

title: Magic Eraser
description: Magic Studio Eraser is an AI-powered tool that can remove unwanted things from images in seconds. It is free to use and does not require any signup or login.

title: Perplexity
description: Perplexity AI is a search engine that uses AI to retrieve information and fill in gaps in knowledge. It is a tool that can be used to enhance research projects and offers snippets, functions, variable names, or even entire code lines, saving valuable time.

title: Moises App
description: Moises.ai is an AI-powered music production app that helps musicians practice, create, and remix their favorite songs. It can separate vocals and instruments from any song, create backing tracks, and slow down or speed up songs without changing the pitch.

title: Lensa
description: Lensa is an AI-powered photo editor that can be used to enhance your photos in a variety of ways. It offers features such as skin smoothing, background blur, artistic filters, and Magic Avatar, which turns your selfies into realistic artwork in different styles.

title: Otter.ai
description: Otter.ai is an AI-powered meeting transcription app that can help you capture and share meeting notes, conversations, and ideas. It offers real-time transcription, searchable transcripts, and collaborative editing.

title: Framer AI
description: Framer AI is a tool that uses artificial intelligence to help you create websites without any coding knowledge. You can start with a simple prompt and the AI will generate a beautiful, responsive website for you. You can then customize the website to your liking.

title: Luma AI
description: Luma AI is best known for its ability to create photorealistic 3D models from smartphone captures. It uses artificial intelligence to capture the intricate details of real-world objects, such as their shape, texture, and lighting, and then recreate them in 3D.

title: Rix
description: Rix is an AI chatbot developed by Hashnode that aims to help developers find accurate and up-to-date information .

title: SlidesAI
description: SlidesAI is an AI-powered presentation tool that can create presentations from text, topic, or even images. It also has features like text summarization, image search, and citation search. SlidesAI is available as a Google Slides extension.

title: Google AI Studio
description: Google AI Studio is a platform designed to help users create and manage AI models and applications. It offers a variety of tools and features, including API keys, real-time streaming, starter apps, model tuning, and a prompt gallery. Users can also access API documentation, a developer forum, and a changelog to stay updated with the latest developments.

title: Claude
description: Claude is a next-generation AI assistant built by Anthropic. It is designed to be safe, accurate, and secure, helping users create and manage various tasks such as drafting and iterating on websites, graphics, documents, and code. Claude is available on the web, iOS, and Android platforms.

title: NotebookLM
description: NotebookLM is an AI-powered research assistant and note-taking tool developed by Google. It leverages the advanced Gemini 1.5 Pro model to summarize information and generate insights from uploaded documents. Users can upload various sources, such as PDFs, Google Docs, and YouTube videos, to create a centralized notebook. NotebookLM provides accurate responses with in-line citations and sources, ensuring accuracy and traceability. It also offers features like audio podcast generation, interactive engagement with conversational AI, and multimedia integration.
